articles.author: Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: France has ‘trouble understanding’ US halt on cyber operations against Russia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: French foreign minister said Russia is a clear cyber threat to European countries.
articles.content:
Hegseth's move raised eyebrows in Europe, where Russia is seen as a main threat in cyberspace together with China. 
Both French diplomatic officials and President Emmanuel Macron have repeatedly acc… [+422 chars]
